item.title: Android Presentation Patterns: MVC
item.description: Disclaimer: You probably shouldn’t use MVC in your Android app, there are much better solutions nowadays, that I mention later in this post. Hello old friend Model-View-Controller is old indeed, for IT standards at least. Its origins are dating back to the development of Smalltalk-80 in the 1970s. You remember book “Design Patterns” by the Gang of 4? Yup, its mentioned there (and the book has examples in Smalltalk). It was introduced to address the challenges of creating graphical user interfaces.
